mapper.select: SELECT distinct a.attend_no, a.user_no, a.attend_start, a.attend_end, a.attend_status, a.attend_date, a.attend_total FROM attendance a LEFT JOIN attendance_edit_approval aea ON a.attend_no = aea.attend_no WHERE a.user_no =#{user_no} AND (aea.attendapp_status IS NULL OR aea.attendapp_status != 2) AND (a.attend_status = '결근' OR a.attend_status = '지각' OR a.attend_status = '조퇴') ORDER BY a.attend_date desc
select * from attendance where user_no =#{user_no} and date(attend_date) = date(now()) ORDER BY attend_no DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance (user_no, attend_start, attend_date, attend_status) VALUES ( #{user_no}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul', CURRENT_DATE, CASE WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM NOW()) >= EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (SELECT p.standard_start_time FROM policy p INNER JOIN user_policy up ON p.policy_no = up.policy_no WHERE up.user_no = #{user_no})) THEN '지각' ELSE '정상' END )

END, attend_status = CASE WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM NOW()) >= EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (SELECT p.standard_end_time FROM policy p INNER JOIN user_policy up ON p.policy_no = up.policy_no WHERE up.user_no = #{user_no})) AND EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (SELECT attend_start FROM attendance WHERE user_no = #{user_no} ORDER BY attend_no DESC LIMIT 1)) < EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (SELECT p.standard_start_time FROM policy p INNER JOIN user_policy up ON p.policy_no = up.policy_no WHERE up.user_no = #{user_no})) THEN '정상' WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM NOW()) >= EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (SELECT p.standard_end_time FROM policy p INNER JOIN user_policy up ON p.policy_no = up.policy_no WHERE up.user_no = #{user_no})) AND EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (SELECT attend_start FROM attendance WHERE user_no = #{user_no} ORDER BY attend_no DESC LIMIT 1)) >= EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (SELECT p.standard_start_time FROM policy p INNER JOIN user_policy up ON p.policy_no = up.policy_no WHERE up.user_no = #{user_no})) THEN '지각' WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM NOW()) < EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (SELECT p.standard_end_time FROM policy p INNER JOIN user_policy up ON p.policy_no = up.policy_no WHERE up.user_no = #{user_no})) AND EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (SELECT attend_start FROM attendance WHERE user_no = #{user_no} ORDER BY attend_no DESC LIMIT 1)) < EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (SELECT p.standard_start_time FROM policy p INNER JOIN user_policy up ON p.policy_no = up.policy_no WHERE up.user_no = #{user_no})) THEN '조퇴' ELSE '결근' END WHERE attend_no = ( SELECT attend_no FROM attendance WHERE user_no = #{user_no} ORDER BY attend_no DESC LIMIT 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(a.attend_date, g.generate_series) AS attend_date, COALESCE(CAST(attend_total AS TIME), '00:00:00') AS attend_total FROM ( SELECT generate_series( DATE_TRUNC('week', NOW()), DATE_TRUNC('week', NOW()) + INTERVAL '6 days', INTERVAL '1 day' )::DATE AS generate_series ) g LEFT JOIN attendance a ON a.user_no = #{user_no} AND a.attend_date = g.generate_series AND a.attend_status IN ('정상', '지각', '조퇴', '결근') ORDER BY attend_date ASC

SELECT COALESCE(a.attend_date, g.generate_series) AS attend_date, COALESCE(CAST(attend_total AS TIME), '00:00:00') AS attend_total FROM ( SELECT generate_series( DATE_TRUNC('week', NOW()), DATE_TRUNC('week', NOW()) + INTERVAL '6 days', INTERVAL '1 day' )::DATE AS generate_series ) g LEFT JOIN attendance a ON a.user_no = #{user_no} AND a.attend_date = g.generate_series AND a.attend_status IN ('휴가(연차)', '휴가(오전반차)', '휴가(오후반차)', '휴가(공가)') ORDER BY attend_date ASC

SELECT COALESCE(a.attend_date, g.generate_series) AS attend_date, COALESCE(CAST(attend_total AS TIME), '00:00:00') AS attend_total FROM ( SELECT generate_series( DATE_TRUNC('week', NOW()), DATE_TRUNC('week', NOW()) + INTERVAL '6 days', INTERVAL '1 day' )::DATE AS generate_series ) g LEFT JOIN attendance a ON a.user_no = #{user_no} AND a.attend_date = g.generate_series AND a.attend_status IN ('연장', '초과') ORDER BY attend_date ASC

SELECT d.dept_no, d.dept_name, da.user_no, da.dept_designated_date, u.user_name, u.user_position, a.attend_no, a.attend_start, a.attend_end, a.attend_status, a.attend_total, a.attend_date FROM dept d INNER JOIN dept_assign da ON d.dept_no = da.dept_no INNER JOIN users u ON da.user_no = u.user_no INNER JOIN attendance a ON u.user_no = a.user_no where d.dept_no = #{dept_no} ORDER BY CASE WHEN u.user_position = '부장' THEN 1 WHEN u.user_position = '팀장' THEN 2 WHEN u.user_position = '과장' THEN 3 WHEN u.user_position = '대리' THEN 4 WHEN u.user_position = '사원' THEN 5 ELSE 6 end

SELECT d.dept_no, d.dept_name, da.user_no, da.dept_designated_date, u.user_name, u.user_position, MAX(CASE WHEN a.attend_date = week_start + INTERVAL '-1 days' THEN a.attend_status END) AS monday_status, MAX(CASE WHEN a.attend_date = week_start + INTERVAL '0 days' THEN a.attend_status END) AS tuesday_status, MAX(CASE WHEN a.attend_date = week_start + INTERVAL '1 days' THEN a.attend_status END) AS wednesday_status, MAX(CASE WHEN a.attend_date = week_start + INTERVAL '2 days' THEN a.attend_status END) AS thursday_status, MAX(CASE WHEN a.attend_date = week_start + INTERVAL '3 days' THEN a.attend_status END) AS friday_status, MAX(CASE WHEN a.attend_date = week_start + INTERVAL '4 days' THEN a.attend_status END) AS saturday_status, MAX(CASE WHEN a.attend_date = week_start + INTERVAL '5 days' THEN a.attend_status END) AS sunday_status, CONCAT( EXTRACT(HOUR FROM interval '1 second' * SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM a.attend_total))), '시간 ', EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM interval '1 second' * SUM(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM a.attend_total))), '분' ) AS total_time FROM dept d INNER JOIN dept_assign da ON d.dept_no = da.dept_no INNER JOIN users u ON da.user_no = u.user_no LEFT JOIN attendance a ON u.user_no = a.user_no CROSS JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT date_trunc('week', #{week_monday}::DATE) + interval '1 day' AS week_start ) AS week_start_info WHERE d.dept_no = #{dept_no} AND a.attend_date + INTERVAL '1 days' >= week_start AND a.attend_date < week_start + INTERVAL '6 days' GROUP BY d.dept_no, d.dept_name, da.user_no, da.dept_designated_date, u.user_name, u.user_position ORDER BY CASE WHEN u.user_position = '부장' THEN 1 WHEN u.user_position = '팀장' THEN 2 WHEN u.user_position = '과장' THEN 3 WHEN u.user_position = '대리' THEN 4 WHEN u.user_position = '사원' THEN 5 ELSE 6 end
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance (user_no, attend_status, attend_date) SELECT n AS user_no, '결근' AS attend_status, CURRENT_DATE AS attend_date FROM ( SELECT generate_series(1, 7) AS n ) AS numbers WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM attendance WHERE user_no = numbers.n AND attend_date = CURRENT_DATE ) AND EXTRACT(ISODOW FROM CURRENT_DATE) NOT IN (6,7)
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('week', attend_date) AS week_start_date, COALESCE(SUM(attend_total), '00:00:00') AS attend_total FROM attendance WHERE user_no = #{user_no} AND DATE_TRUNC('week', attend_date) = DATE_TRUNC('week', now()) AND attend_status not IN ('초과') GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('week', attend_date)

SELECT DATE_TRUNC('week', attend_date) AS week_start_date, COALESCE(SUM(attend_total), '00:00:00') AS attend_total FROM attendance WHERE user_no = #{user_no} AND DATE_TRUNC('week', attend_date) = DATE_TRUNC('week', now()) AND attend_status IN ('초과') GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('week', attend_date)
